outcomes: Increased internal network visibility and reduced time taken to diagnose system issues
Reduced time taken to update network information into the database and dashboards
responsibilities: Developed new and existing dashboards for consumption by internal stakeholders
Created regexes to pattern match and feed into the Neo4j database
Developed concurrent solution to parse network information into the Neo4j database
content.description: The NSSOT project was designed to increase internal network visibility within Cisco and inform engineers of almost real-time network changes. This involves a series of dashboards, a relational database and a GoLang backend that regularly fetched information from network devices.
